Hydras:

Hydras took Maxima's arm and sai "We can be together a little 
more"said with a smile"Just a little more"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> She nodded. "Of course." She would enjoy Hevn's demise if it came 
to that. 
> 
> "Other than Sideays & Hevn... I don't suspect anyone else of such 
problems. 
> Scourge, I can trust." she smirked at the thought of him. In his 
new form, the 
> wolf humanoid/beast dragon. 
> 
> Waiting for all this to get over with. She actually, hoped for a 
little more 
> time to be near Hydras. It was sad that all these years, all these 
millenia, 
> she rarely had such an opportunity. & now that she had a great 
opportunity, it 
> was still a rarity to be with him. She wondered how much of 
Hydras, what parts 
> of Megatron & what parts of Galvatron had the actual feelings for 
her. Was it 
> something recent? Was it something that stayed hidden for a long 
time. 
> 
> Pushing it all aside, Hydras was right, duty first... pleasure 
later.
